wgsl-analyzer.disableProgressNotificatio.markdownDescription: Disable initialization and workdone progress notifications

wgsl-analyzer.terminal.startinsert.markdownDescription: Enter insert mode after terminal displayed

wgsl-analyzer.debug.runtime.markdownDescription: Choose which debug runtime to use

wgsl-analyzer.debug.vimspector.configura.markdownDescription: Specify the name of the vimspector configuration name. The following args will be passed to the configuration: `Executable` and `Args` (both strings)

wgsl-analyzer.debug.nvimdap.configuratio.markdownDescription: Configuration template used to invoked dap.run([conf](https://github.com/mfussenegger/nvim-dap/blob/0e6b7c47dd70e80793ed39271b2aa712d9366dbc/doc/dap.txt#L656C2-L656C2)). The template will be instantiated like this: `$exe` will be replaced with executable path, `$args` will be replaced with arguments.

wgsl-analyzer.server.path.markdownDescription: Path to wgsl-analyzer executable (points to bundled binary by default). If this is set, then "wgsl-analyzer.updates.channel" setting is not used

wgsl-analyzer.server.extraEnv.markdownDescription: Extra environment variables that will be passed to the wgsl-analyzer executable. Useful for passing e.g. `RA_LOG` for debugging.

wgsl-analyzer.restartServerOnConfigChang.markdownDescription: Whether to restart the server automatically when certain settings that require a restart are changed.

wgsl-analyzer.updates.prompt.markdownDescription: Prompt the user before downloading wgsl-analyzer

wgsl-analyzer.updates.channel.markdownDescription: Choose `"nightly"` updates to get the latest features and bug fixes every day. While `"stable"` releases occur weekly and don't contain cutting-edge features from VS Code proposed APIs
enumDescriptions: `"stable"` updates are shipped weekly, they don't contain cutting-edge features from VS Code proposed APIs but have less bugs in general

`"nightly"` updates are shipped daily (extension updates automatically by downloading artifacts directly from GitHub), they contain cutting-edge features and latest bug fixes. These releases help us get your feedback very quickly and speed up wgsl-analyzer development **drastically**
